Happy birthday to the wonderful woman I met 12 years ago! From the moment we met, I fell in love within the first 5 years, and that feeling has only grown stronger since. You are the woman who makes me feel alive in every way. Thank you for being such an incredible part of my life. May your special day be filled with joy, love, and all the happiness you deserve.

About Her

I think she is a beautiful, funny, and intelligent woman. I'm always amazed by all the little things u do. The way u smile, ur heartwarming laughter, and ur brilliant thoughts always captivate me. Every moment with u feels special, and I feel so lucky to know u. u are an inspiring person who makes me feel more alive.

I often feel a sense of loss and end up blaming myself. Maybe it really is my fault, and I'm truly sorry. I always enjoy our conversations, no matter the topic. If you want to know, I'd love to talk to you all the time, but I understand that it can't be forced. In the end, I respect your peace and space.

To my fav person, be safe always, i love you
